items.label: Document that the medication will be used in addition to a reduced calorie diet and increased physical activity for chronic weight management.
items.validation: Stop and Ask Clinical Staff to Make a Referral. (This Does Not Require Documentation).

items.label: A documented initial body mass index (BMI) greater than or equal to 27 kg/m^2 (overweight).
items.validation: Stop and Ask Clinical Staff to Make a Referral. (This Does Not Require Documentation).

items.label: Document that Wegovy will not be coadministered with other semaglutide-containing products or with any other GLP-1 receptor agonist.
items.validation: Stop and Ask Clinical Staff to Make a Referral. (This Does Not Require Documentation).

items.label: Document that the medication will be used with a reduced calorie diet and increased physical activity for chronic weight management.
items.validation: Stop and Ask Clinical Staff to Make a Referral. (This Does Not Require Documentation).

items.label: Document an initial baseline BMI at the 95th percentile or greater, standardized for age and sex (obesity).
items.validation: Stop and Ask Clinical Staff to Make a Referral. (This Does Not Require Documentation).

items.label: Document that Wegovy will not be coadministered with other semaglutide-containing products or with any other GLP-1 receptor agonist.
items.validation: Stop and Ask Clinical Staff to Make a Referral. (This Does Not Require Documentation).
